metadata.title: Evaluate to true if the ind-def:family_test is properly supported
metadata.description: This definition is intended to evalutate to true if the interpreter properly supports the ind-def:family_test and all of its valid operations.

notes.note: It is important to note that the values used in this test definition are specific to a particular machine, and may not necessarily apply to your system. As a result, in order to have the definition return a result of 'true', you must either change these values to the ones found on your particular system, or you must configure your system to use these values.

criterion.comment: Test that the family_object is supported.

family_test.comment: Test that the family_object is supported.

family_object.comment: This variable_object represents the family that the operating system belongs to.

family_state.comment: This variable_state represents any family that is in the EntityStateFamilyType (ios, macos, unix, windows).

constant_variable.comment: This variable contains a regular expression that matches the regular expression '(ios|macos|unix|windows)'.
